name: Alpha Please
title: 5 Alpha Tweets Sober Market Update BTC DeFi Cheat Sheet More
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market experienced a significant $10B liquidation event, but Bitcoin demonstrated resilience by maintaining support above $91,000, suggesting underlying market strength despite volatility.

Key Insights
- Largest crypto liquidation event in dollar terms occurred, with $10B wiped out in a single day
- Bitcoin showed unexpected strength by not dropping below $91,000 during the market turbulence
- The market is currently in recovery mode
- Solana-based DeFi protocol Kamino recently reached a new Total Value Locked (TVL) all-time high of $2.75B
- JLP (a diversified index fund of SOL, ETH, WBTC, USDC, USDT) is highlighted as a relatively stable leveraged yield opportunity
- Market participants are advised to carefully review their portfolio holdings and risk exposure
